modules.description: Provides functions to convert values to strings based on their type, using standard library implementations for primitive types. Works with integers, strings, and custom data types defined in the codebase. Enables direct serialization of values for logging or debugging without manual conversion.

Derives annotated casting functions from arrow types or finds specific conversions between types, with error handling for ambiguous or missing mappings. Processes OCaml core types and expressions to enable type-safe value transformations. Used to generate explicit type casts in code during macro expansion or type-driven code generation.
